effect_entries.effect:
Held by genesect
:   Holder's buster is yellow, and its techno blast is electric-type.
effect_entries.short_effect: Grants Genesect a yellow, Electric-type Techno Blast.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ゲノセクトに　持たせると
テクノバスターという　技が
でんきタイプになる　カセット。

A cassette to be held by Genesect.
It changes Genesect’s Techno Blast
move so it becomes Electric type.

Modulo da dare a Genesect. Trasforma
Tecnobotto in una mossa di tipo Elettro.

Chocolatina de sabor dulce. Restaura 20 PS de
un Pokémon.

Gibt man es Genesect zum Tragen, wandelt es
den Typ der Attacke Techblaster in Elektro um.

Tenu par Genesect, ce module change la
capacité TechnoBuster en une capacité de type
Électrik.

게노세크트에게 지니게 하면
테크노버스터라는 기술이
전기타입으로 바뀌는 카세트.

ゲノセクトに　もたせると
テクノバスターという　わざが
でんきタイプになる　カセット。

A cassette to be held by Genesect.
It changes Techno Blast to an
Electric-type move.

A cassette to be held by Genesect.
It changes Techno Blast to an
Electric-type move.

Tenu par Genesect, ce module
change la capacité TechnoBuster
en une capacité de type Électrik.
